title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the estimate

1 point is earned for the interpretation with units

w'(12)≈ w(15)−w(9) 15−9 = 67.9 6 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4BF6@

=1.017 (or 1.016)

The water temperature is increasing at a rate of approximately 1.017oF per minute at time t=12.
